item.title: Deeper Dive Series: How Can I Become Less Defensive & More Vulnerable - Part 2 with Stephen Schettini
item.description: In this episode, Dr. Judith and guest Stephen Schettini explore the transition from being defensive to becoming more vulnerable. Stephen, a former Buddhist monk with over 40 years of teaching mindfulness, shares insights into how learned behaviors shape defensiveness and how true vulnerability is a natural state. They discuss the importance of self-observation, breaking down the barriers created by ego, and the role of courage and stillness in achieving authenticity... Feed: https://feeds.captivate.fm/mastering-lifes-adventures/
